text.section:
Sec. 23-63. Amounts paid under workers' compensation.
Any amounts paid or payable under these provisions shall be reduced by any amounts paid or payable under the provisions of the State worker's compensation law, except that the foregoing limitations shall not reduce the statutory obligations imposed on account of the State worker's compensation law during the period of such statutory obligation. Any amounts paid or payable as an obligation of the State worker's compensation law shall not reduce the amount of twenty thousand dollars ($20,000.00) provided for herein.
